name: Lit'l Bots chat [code-golf]
description:
In an internal chat system called the l1t'l bots, a chat is performed by using an alphanumeric sequence send from one bot to the other.

The protocol followed to validate-complete a chat is shown below:
```
Sum of digits in first bot must equal sum of digits in the second bot.
           Note: all numbers are expected to be positive.
```

You are required to code a chat validator for the above system. The validator should take in an array of the message send by a pair of bots and validate the conversation by returning a response of **true or false**.


***Note:***
 

The mini bots can only hold a program of **up to 75 characters max** due to memory limitations of the system.
